7.post_text: McDonald’s Mandy Nge (pictured on the extreme left), 49-year-old Crew leader at the McDonald’s Tampines East CC restaurant has been selected to be part of the Olympic Champion Crew for the second time. This July, she’ll bring her service-with-a-smile attitude to London and serve at one of the world’s biggest sporting events, the London 2012 Olympics.
